name: Add new Edusign students to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as new rows
description: Every time a new student is created in Edusign, Make will automatically add that student to a new row in your Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KkPNXIUj25YZioUUnNuE6bhMuBuHJGLFmNXS_xuVvEE/edit?usp=sharing).
